trans-unit.source: Provides caching functionality for a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> does not cache bitmap data automatically.
Using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap> can improve performance in scenarios where multiple operations (such as clipping an image or scaling) need to be performed on a single bitmap.
Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap"></xref> that has the specified source, bitmap create options, and bitmap cache option.
The source bitmap that is being cached.
Initialization options for the bitmap image.
Specifies how the bitmap is cached to memory.
Occurs when source is `null`.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.CachedBitmap"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
